Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    tripleplay.util.TextConfig
    Use TextStyle and StyledText.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    tripleplay.ui.Button.DEBOUNCE_DELAY
    Use Behavior.Click.DEBOUNCE_DELAY.
    tripleplay.ui.Style.TextEffectStyle.outline
    Use Style.TextEffectStyle.pixelOutline.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop.atEventPos(Events.Position)
    use TRIGGER_POINT
    tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop.atLayerX(Layer, float)
    use TRIGGER_POINT
    tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop.atLayerY(Layer, float)
    use TRIGGER_POINT
    tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop.atScreenPos(float, float)
    use TRIGGER_POINT
    tripleplay.anim.Animator.create()
    Just construct Animator directly now.
    tripleplay.ui.Style.createTextFormat(Element)
    Use Style.createTextStyle(tripleplay.ui.Element<?>).
    tripleplay.flump.Library.fromAssets(String, Callback)
    Use JsonLoader.loadLibrary(java.lang.String, playn.core.util.Callback<tripleplay.flump.Library>).
    tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop.halign(Style.HAlign)
    use POPUP_ORIGIN
    tripleplay.util.Glyph.renderText(TextConfig, String)
    Use #renderText(StyledText).
    tripleplay.util.Glyph.renderText(TextConfig, TextLayout)
    Use #renderText(StyledText).
    tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop.toBottom(float)
    use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
    tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop.toLeft(float)
    use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
    tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop.toRight(float)
    use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
    tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop.toTop(float)
    use POPUP_ORIGIN and TRIGGER_POINT
    tripleplay.ui.MenuHost.Pop.valign(Style.VAlign)
    use POPUP_ORIGIN
